attributes.action: Scrap Care Allowance & Bring forward a Non Taxable Carers Incentive Payment.
attributes.additional_details:
Carers Allowance doesn't work to support us as Carers.
Carers incentive payments will support us to carry on our caring role and benefit us by not restricting our earnings at work. 
This will deter and reduce extended benefit claims. 
Those unable to seek employment should be placed above the unemployment rate.
Pensioners and universal credit claimants will have financial acknowledgement for ther caring roles.
attributes.background:
Carers Allowance should be withdrawn. Bring forward 
Carers Incentive Payments :
Based on 35hrs a week care
Under 4 criteria :
1) In paid Employment.
2) Not in Employment non eligible for benefits.
3) Claimants of benefits.
4) Pensioners.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about how Carer's Allowance currently operates, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to replace Carer's Allowance with.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Pay Carer's Allowance in addition to any other benefits or state pension: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612708

Increase Carer's Allowance to equal 35 hours at the National Living Wage
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599102

If you want something else, email us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk and we can try and help you start a new petition.
